patterns: IIS worker process consuming High Memory
How to fix high memory issues
How to fix high memory issues in IIS worker process
How to fix high memory issues in IIS w3wp process
responses:
For high memory issues, always take IIS worker process dump from 'Task Manager --> Details' tab. Choose the top consuming process and right click on it to select 'Create Dump file'.
Furthermore follow up with customer and perform IIS reset/app pool recyle as needed.
Sample Incident reference - ABC

patterns: How to restart IIS via command line
responses:
Open the command terminal and type command as required:
 'iisreset /stop'  to stop the iis
 'iisreset /start' to start the iis 
 'iisreset /restart' to restart the iis 
 'iisreset /status' to check iis status
